# isMatrixLike

> Test if a value is [matrix][matrix]-like.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var isMatrixLike = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-matrix-like' );
```

#### isMatrixLike( value )

Tests if a value is [matrix][matrix]-like.

``` javascript
var mat = {
    'data': new Int8Array( 10 ),
    'shape': [ 5, 2 ],
    'offset': 0,
    'strides': [ 2, 1 ],
    'dtype': 'int8',
    'length': 10
};

console.log( isMatrixLike( mat ) );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

``` javascript
var isMatrixLike = require( '@stdlib/assert/is-matrix-like' );

var mat = {
    'data': new Int8Array( 10 ),
    'shape': [ 5, 2 ],
    'offset': 0,
    'strides': [ 2, 1 ],
    'dtype': 'int8',
    'length': 10
};
console.log( isMatrixLike( mat ) );
// returns true

console.log( isMatrixLike( [] ) );
// returns false

console.log( isMatrixLike( {} ) );
// returns false

console.log( isMatrixLike( null ) );
// returns false
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
